articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Guidance to Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Guidance to Industrial Establishments
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-site guidance to the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex and the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine.
					 Accompanying him were Secretary Kim Ki Nam and department directors Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex.
					
					 Guided by the leading officials of the complex, he went to the room devoted to its history.
					
					 Then he went round the general production direction office and other parts of the complex to learn in detail about the output of electricity.
					
					 After going round the exterior and interior of the cultural and welfare facilities, including the Taephyong Health Centre built in a peculiar style in the compound of the complex, he said: It is admirable that the officials of the complex wonderfully built those facilities urgently necessary for the workers' living to provide them with better conditions for culture and rest.
					
					 The complex's position and role are very important as it takes a big portion in the nation's electricity output, he said, advancing the tasks to be carried out by the complex.
					
					 What is the most important task facing the complex is to ensure the efficient equipment and technical management so as to bring the equipment into full operation, he stressed.
					
					 In order to normalize the power output on a high level at the complex, it is important, above all, to supply in time enough coal, the main fuel for thermal power plant, he said, underlining the need to increase the coal production at the relevant coal mines and well organize the transport of it at the railway sector.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine.
					
					 He went round the monuments to President Kim Il Sung's on-site guidance and instructions and the room devoted to the history of the mine.
					
					 After being briefed on the mine in front of the map on its prospective plan, he went round the general production direction office, the room for scientific and technological studies, supply service facilities and other places of the mine to acquaint himself in detail with its modernization project and production.
					
					 Saying that the mine has very important mission and role to play, he set forth the tasks facing the mine.
					
					 He held that the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex, including the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine, should be built up in a prospective way to be turned into a leading coal producer as it is abundant in deposit of quality coal.

articles.title: Joint Press Release by KAPPC and Hyundai Group
articles.content:
Joint Press Release by KAPPC and Hyundai Group
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A joint press release between the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee and the Hyundai Group of south Korea was made public on Monday.
					 The release says:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, on August 16 granted a long audience to and had a cordial talk with Hyon Jong Un, chairperson of the Hyundai Group, and her party on a visit to Pyongyang, and complied with all her requests.
					
					 Accordingly, the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee and the Hyundai Group will execute as follows:
					
					1. It was decided to resume the suspended tourism of Mt. Kumgang as soon as possible and launch the tour of Pirobong, the highest peak in the mountain.
					
					All necessary facilities and security for tourism will be reliably provided according to the special measure taken by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					2. It was decided to restore land passage of the south side's personnel through the Military Demarcation Line and their stay in the north side's area as they were according to the spirit of the historic October 4 declaration.
					
					3. It was decided to resume the tourism of Kaesong soon and energize the operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone as the land passage through MDL is put on a normal basis.
					
					4. The Hyundai Group decided to begin tourism of Mt. Paektu in accordance with the progress of its preparations.
					
					5. It was decided to provide reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south in Mt. Kumgang on the day of Chusok (harvest moon day), a folk holiday of the Korean nation, this year.
					
					 Both sides expressed will to improve the north-south relations and further develop the cooperation for the common prosperity of the nation under the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: KPA Supreme Command Orders Army, People and Country to Be on Special Alert
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command Orders Army, People and Country to Be on Special Alert
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army made public the following report Monday as regards the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors kicked off the large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression despite of the DPRK's repeated warnings and strong protest and denunciation of the public at home and abroad:
					 The adventurous war maneuvers for aggression to be staged from August 17 to 27 will massively involve more than 10,000 U.S. imperialist aggression troops based in south Korea and overseas, at least 56,000 troops of the puppet army including those of corps, fleets and air division-level commands and above them and, over 400,000 members of puppet administrative organs and military and non-military businesses and other huge forces and all sorts of lethal means.
					
					 What merits special attention is that the saber-rattling is base on the new scenario for more vicious joint operation to invade the DPRK replacing the "OPLAN 5027", scenario for the second Korean war of aggression.
					
					 The said provocative exercises are a blatant challenge and grave threat to the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia as they are aimed to launch aggression and mount a surprise preemptive strike on the DPRK in the light of their contents, nature and scale, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive on-looker to the prevailing touch-and-go situation where dark clouds of a nuclear war are gathering to hang heavily over the inviolable territory of their country.
					
					 It is the invariable stand and attitude of the KPA to react to the enemy's arms with artillery pieces, "sanctions" with merciless retaliation and "confrontation" with an all-out confrontation.
					
					 The KPA Supreme Command issued the following order, proceeding from its sacred mission to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and devotedly safeguard the socialist homeland of the DPRK:
					
					1. The entire army, all the people and the whole country shall be put on a special alert from August 17, 2009.
					
					2. The units of the KPA three services and all members of the Korean People's Security Forces, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards shall closely follow all the moves of the aggressors with high revolutionary vigilance and make an immediate strong attack on perpetrators of any hostile act of intruding the sky, land and seas of the country.
					
					3. All the people shall bring about a new leaping forward in the 150-day campaign to step up the building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in tense and mobilized posture as required by the present acute situation.
					
					 The order of the KPA Supreme Command is a just self-defensive measure to protect the supreme interests of the country and nation from the reckless moves of the warmongers to invade the DPRK.
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets commit even the slightest military provocation infringing upon the DPRK's sovereignty, its revolutionary armed forces grown stronger with the might of Songun will mount a merciless and prompt annihilating strike at the aggressors with all offensive and defensive means including nuclear deterrent involved.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slammed
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on August 17 denouncing the dangerous Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers claimed that the war maneuvers are "ordinary drills for defence" and they "do not involve field mobile exercises" but this is nothing but sheer sophism intended to cover up the aggressive nature and the ulterior aim sought by them through this saber rattling.
					
					 The north-targeted large-scale war maneuvers kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppets are absolutely intolerable as they were prompted by a dangerous scenario to provide a military backing to their persistent campaign for "sanctions" on the DPRK.
					
					 Moreover, the Lee Myung Bak group is persistently playing the role of a shock brigade in implementing its master's reckless policy of aggression towards the DPRK instead of drawing a lesson from its confrontation with Pyongyang, a policy that brought the inter-Korean relations to collapse. This behavior of the group only betrayed its ulterior design not to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The reality clearly indicates that "sincere dialogue" and "cooperation" on the lips of the Lee group are nothing but crafty chicanery intended to mislead the public in south Korea and evade the responsibility for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The hostile relations on the Korean Peninsula can never be mended unless a definite end is put to the U.S. extremely hostile policy towards the DPRK and the confrontation with the DPRK pursued by the south Korean conservative authorities, its stooges, noted the statement.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of World Peace Council
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of World Peace Council
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with the delegation of the World Peace Council led by its President Socorro Gomes at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Delegation of World Peace Council
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Delegation of World Peace Council 
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the World Peace Council on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was handed by President of the council Socorro Gomes who is leading the delegation to an official concerned.

articles.title: Tideland Turns into Arable Land
articles.content:
Tideland Turns into Arable Land
						
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Taegyedo tideland constructors have recently dammed about 14 kilometers of rough sea to acquire 8,800 hectares of land.
					 Prior to this, they had reclaimed the Pidansom tideland of 5,500 hectares so that Sindo County came into being. And they reclaimed the Tasado tideland of 1,000 hectares and Kwaksan, Soho and Sokhwa tidelands totaling 2,600 hectares. As a result, the Korean map has changed beyond recognition.
					
					 Islets in the sea including Taedasa, Kacha, Soyondong, Taegye and Sogye have been connected to turn into land and the coastline of Yomju and Cholsan counties extending scores of kilometers was shortened remarkably.
					
					 The sea dike makes it possible to protect the farmland from salt damage. Rice has already been planted in the paddy field of 2,600 hectares in the Taegyedo tideland, producing a large quantity of rice every year.
					
					 The completion of the Taegyedo tideland reclamation will further extend the arable land of the country.
					
					 On the other hand, a great ring road will be formed and fresh water and sea water reservoirs with shellfish and lobster farms and salt fields will be built.

articles.title: Signal Success in Tideland Reclamation
articles.content:
Signal Success in Tideland Reclamation
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Taegyedo tideland constructors in North Phyongan Province are striving to create a great creature which will shine along with the Songun era.
					 This area which had been part of the sea till several years ago has turned into cultivated land and large quantities of rice been harvested in the paddy field every year.
					
					 It is a precious fruition and demonstration of inexhaustible strong will of the constructors to build a thriving nation in this land without fail with their own efforts and technology.
					
					 On August 21, Juche 86 (1997), an unexpected strong storm and tidal wave heavily damaged the dam of Taegyedo tideland.
					
					 It washed away more than 9,800 meters of dam in four sections.
					
					 However, the constructors rebuilt the dam in the three sections out of the four. It was most difficult to build dam No. 3, the last section.
					
					 A big eddy caused by the high or low tide in a narrow section washed away 32m-long dam in a twinkle and then 25m a few days later. 
					
					 Through the damaged section 35 meters deep, 250 million tons of seawater came in and out twice a day, digging deeper the beds of both sides. 
					
					 There was an opinion that it was impossible to dam it without shutting out the gravitation of the moon. This once drove the constructors to despair.
					
					 Full of confidence and optimism on the future and indomitable fighting will, however, the constructors rose again and fought against the raging waves, applying new construction methods in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 Thanks to their death-defying struggle, the project for damming the section was concluded with success on June 11, 2005.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Taegyedo tideland reclamation site some time ago and highly appreciated them as brave conquerors of sea and indomitable fighters who expanded the land of the country, buffeting rough waves.
					
					 Encouraged by this, the builders are striving harder for the completion of the tideland reclamation project.

articles.title: Remains of Korean Draftees Found in Japan
articles.content:
Remains of Korean Draftees Found in Japan
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- More remains of Koreans, who were taken to Japan for forced labor during the past military occupation of Korea by the Japanese imperialists, were unearthed, according to a south Korean Yonhap News report dated Aug. 14.
					 Those remains of 20 odd bodies were estimated to belong to Koreans who were drafted for the construction of an airport in Hokkaido of Japan between 1943 and 1945.
					
					 Some of the remains were found with broken waist bones ghastly buried and most of them cremated.
					
					 The victims were judged to be buried by Japanese just after their death as the remains were found buried in a hollow without care.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Joint Military Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Joint Military Exercises Flayed
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises which the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors kicked off today and will stage till August. 27 in south Korea amount to a dangerous test war and preliminary war as they are aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK to all intents and purposes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is describing this saber rattling as "exercises for strengthening the defensive posture" in a bid to cover up their offensive nature and danger and its scenario to ignite the second Korean war, but this rhetoric can never help cover up the aggressive and provocative nature and gravity of the joint military maneuvers.
					
					 The new scenario for joint operation that replaced the "OPLAN 5027" specifically reflects the contents of various operations and ways to start a war and methods of striking by means for carrying out operations, etc. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the joint military exercises will prove to be a specific course of the U.S. fulfillment of its commitment to provide "a nuclear umbrella" to the south Korean puppets. 
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the U.S. kicked off the exercises under the signboard of "ensuring peace" and "dialogue".
					
					 It is undisguised acts to deny the dialogue and disturb peace that the U.S. warmongers kicked off the war exercises aimed at a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The "strengthened defense posture" touted by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets means a reversed form of a scenario for stepping up the preparations for invading the north. It is the design of the U.S. imperialists to escalate the tension on the peninsula and seize the DPRK through a surprise preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 No one can say that these war maneuvers will not develop into a nuclear war any moment.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop at once its saber rattling.

articles.title: Lee Group Urged to Roll Back Its Anti-Reunification and Confrontational Policy
articles.content:
Lee Group Urged to Roll Back Its Anti-Reunification and Confrontational Policy
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Nonsensical remarks related to the issue of the inter-Korean dialogue are now heard in south Korea after the Pyongyang visit was paid by former U.S. President Clinton. The south Korean ruling quarters are letting loose a spate of sheer sophism, pretending to be interested in the inter-Korean dialogue. They assert that "dialogue depends on the north's attitude and stand" and "landmark measures could be taken if the north took a carrot approach."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The "dialogue" and the like touted by them is nothing but a crafty and hypocritical rigmarole intended to evade their responsibility for having torpedoed the inter-Korean dialogue and placate the south Korean public demanding a switchover in their treacherous and anti-reunification "policy towards the north."
					
					 Their loudmouthed "landmark measures" are illogical and an intolerable mockery and insult to the DPRK.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by them in oft-repeating the issue of the inter-Korean dialogue, trumpeting about "dialogue with the north." Through this they seek to evade the responsibility for having pushed the inter-Korean relations to such phase of distrust and confrontation where there is neither dialogue nor cooperation and the situation on the eve of war and divert elsewhere the attention of the south Korean public desirous of the north-south dialogue.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better honestly repent of their treacherous acts of bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and blocking dialogue quite contrary to the trend of the times and wishes of the fellow countrymen before talking about "dialogue" and roll back at once their anti-reunification and confrontational policy repudiated and denounced by all Koreans.
					
					 Any honeyed words disregarding the above-said demands sound as no more than sheer sophism intended to mislead the public at home and abroad.

articles.title: Truth about Japanese Imperialists' Cremation of Dead Korean Laborers Disclosed
articles.content:
Truth about Japanese Imperialists' Cremation of Dead Korean Laborers Disclosed
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Truth about the cremation of the Korean laborers who met deaths while doing slave labor in Japan was disclosed for the first time, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 This fact was disclosed by the survey paper provided by Hiroshi Ishimura, teacher in Hokkaido, to the south Korean Committee for Probe into Truth about Damage Done by the Japanese Imperialists' Forcible Drafting during Their Occupation of Korea in July.
					
					 The paper made a detailed account of all facts that more than 70 out of the Korean workers who were forced to do slave labor in Hokkaido in the 1930s and 1940s died of pneumonia, consumption, bruise, asphyxia and for other causes and were cremated. 
					
					 Noting that this information clearly shows the miserable plight of the Koreans who were forced to do slave labor at that time, CBS said it is presumed that the Japanese imperialists cremated the dead bodies in a bid to conceal the truth.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Struggle Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Struggle Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A large-scale anti-"government" struggle was launched in Seoul on Saturday with attendance of a total of at least 20,000 people from different walks of life, including members of civic and public organizations and political parties and citizens.
					 An August 15 meeting was held in the university street under the co-sponsorship of the People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy, the People's Action for Nullifying the Canal Project, the Media Action and other civic and public organizations and the Democratic Labor Party and other opposition parties.
					
					 At the meeting, speakers charged that during its tenure the Lee Myung Bak "government" has brought nothing but sufferings to the population and bedeviled the inter-Korean relations with the policy of confrontation and hostility towards the fellow countrymen and totally blocked cooperation and exchange between the north and the south.
					
					 It is impossible to say about August 15 in the true sense of the word without putting an end to the history of division, they noted, contending that the Lee "government" should be forced to step down in order to open the road to reunification.
					
					 Then, an August 15 cultural event for peaceful reunification took place in campus of Hongik University with attendance of over 10,000 people of different strata.
					
					 A resolution, read out at the event, pointed out that Lee Myung Bak made no mention of the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration with August 15 as an occasion. This means, after all, that the present "government" declared again at home and abroad its stand to seek confrontation and war instead of dialogue and reconciliation with the north, it said.
					
					 The resolution stressed that the people from different walks of life in south Korea desirous of national reconciliation and unity, independent reunification, peace and prosperity would rally as one to defend and implement to the letter the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 Meanwhile, rallies were held in different parts of the city on the same day to criticize the puppet group which is engaged in the fascist dictatorship while stifling democracy and opposing reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Vow Anti-"government" Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Vow Anti-"government" Struggle
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- University student representatives from across south Korea, including members of the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and the Students Committee of the Democratic Labor Party, held a rally for punishing Lee Myung Bak and restoring democracy at Hongik University on August 14.
					 A video on the Ryongsan tragedy and the Ssangyong Motor Co. case caused by the conservative ruling forces was shown at the rally before speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers charged that the Lee Myung Bak "government" has brutally cracked down upon the struggles of different circles for vital rights while stifling democracy and intensifying the fascist dictatorship.
					
					 They demanded that the present "government" totally retract its "administration" consistent with fascist dictatorship and confrontation with fellow countrymen and pay attention to the voice of the people.
					
					 If the authorities insist on the treacherous rule, disregarding the demands of different circles, all the university students will take the lead in the struggle for realizing democracy and forcing the dictatorial "government" to step down, they warned.

articles.title: U.S.- South Korea Joint Military Exercises Denounced
articles.content:
U.S.- South Korea Joint Military Exercises Denounced
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association issued a statement on Aug. 11 to denounce the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Noting that the joint military exercises are aimed at invading the DPRK in the light of its contents and scale, the statement added they brought to light the sinister aim lurking behind the signboard of "ensuring peace" and "dialogue" put up by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors recently.
					
					 These provocative and dangerous military exercises can neither be justified nor can they go with dialogue as they are a basic factor of disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 All facts once again clearly prove that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are the arch criminals disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the above-said joint military exercises as renewed provocative acts against the DPRK and strongly demand they cancel the projected joint war maneuvers at once.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean bellicose forces desire peace and detente on the peninsula, they should stop without delay all the military exercises in south Korea and its vicinity.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked
						
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Cambodia and a news briefing in Indonesia and film shows in Ethiopia between Aug. 6 and 10 on the occasions of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed in the venue of the meeting were photos on the exploits performed by the peerlessly great men. 
					
					 A minister of state of Cambodia in his speech praised President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, as savior of the Korean nation who liberated the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company said that the undying feats performed by the President for the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country will be always remembered not only by the Korean people but by the world progressive people. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people under the distinguished Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il will emerge victorious in the future, too.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Arms of Korea," "Spectacular Extravaganza 'Arirang'," etc.

articles.title: Light Industry Exhibition Held in Wartime
articles.content:
Light Industry Exhibition Held in Wartime
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung visited the light industry exhibition held in Pyongyang in October Juche 40 (1951) when the Fatherland Liberation War was at its height.
					 In front of the knitted goods exhibition stand, the President took a suit of children's underwear in his hand and told that it was knitted well and beautifully. These knitted goods should be produced more to be supplied to the people, he added. 
					
					 Then he came to the footwear exhibition stand. He said that the problem of people's footwear should be settled by tapping all the reserves and potentials. In particular, he gave an earnest instruction to officials regarding the production of children's footwear.
					
					 When he stepped towards the cosmetics exhibition stand, some officials exchanged words against the display of cosmetics, noting that it was unbecoming for the wartime.
					
					 He admonished the officials, saying that our people were civilized and strong in revolutionary sprit and like bright and clean things. He stressed that the light and local industries should be further developed in the future to supply full daily necessaries to the people during the wartime.
					
					 The officials were deeply moved by instructions of President Kim Il Sung who was deeply interested in improving the people's livelihood even in the hard-fought war decisive of the destiny of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige en terreno la Tienda Pothonggang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige en terreno la Tienda Pothonggang
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la recien construida Tienda Pothonggang.
					Ante todo, se cercioro en detalles del estado de construccion y exhibicion de mercancias recorriendo por varias horas la parte exterior y la interior de la tienda.
					
					Afirmo que el PTC tiene la firme voluntad de construir todas las obras arquitectonicas de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) que tengan formas y contenidos impecables tanto en el presente como en el futuro remoto.
					
					Prosiguio que deben construir cada tienda y cada vivienda en el maximo nivel para que las masas populares se beneficien de ellas y vivan confortablemente.
					
					Indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para intensificar los servicios conforme a la demanda connatural del comercio socialista destacando que son importantes el deber y el papel de esta tienda para mejorar la vida alimentaria de los capitalinos.
					
					Anadio que mejorar el suministro de las mercancias a los habitantes es la demanda indispensable, que parte del maximo principio que rige las actividades de nuestro partido, y enseno que para este no hay otra tarea mas importante que asegurar al pueblo una vida acomodada y culta.
					
					Hay que construir en varios lugares muchas bases de servicio gastronomico como la Tienda Pothonggang especializada en la venta de las frutas como manzana y los productos de carne procesada, porque son frecuentadas por nuestros habitantes, subrayo y presento las tareas y remedios para este fin.
					
					Destaco que para suministrar al pueblo sin interrupcion durante todo el ano las frutas frescas y diversos articulos de la carne procesada, hay que tomar estrictas medidas de conservacion.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, las bases productoras de frutas y carne deben aumentar aun mas la produccion y organizar con esmero los quehaceres para proveer de estas mercancias.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que todos los servidores de la tienda, una de las bases de servicio al pueblo, registraran un viraje decisivo en el suministro de articulos a los habitantes poniendo de pleno manifiesto su espiritu revolucionario, partidismo, espiritu de la clase obrera y rasgos populares para que fuera mostrada aun mas la superioridad del regimen socialista de nuestro pais centrado en las masas populares.
					
					Le acompanaron los secretarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe a Hyon Jong Un
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe a Hyon Jong Un
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 16 con la presidenta del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea, Hyon Jong Un, y su comitiva que visitan Pyongyang cumplimentando la invitacion del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP).
					En la ocasion, el Dirigente recibio presente que le dedico la visitante.
					
					Tras agradecerlo, recordo con emocion a los anteriores presidentes del Grupo Hyundai y sostuvo cordiales y fraternales conversaciones con Hyon.
					
					Seguidamente, ofrecio un almuerzo en honor de la presidenta Hyon y su comitiva.
					
					Estuvo presente aqui el presidente del CCPAP, Kim Yang Gon.

articles.title: Joint Press Release by KAPPC and Hyundai Group
articles.content:
Joint Press Release by KAPPC and Hyundai Group
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- Quedo publicado el dia 17 el comunicado conjunto del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) y el Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea.
					Segun el documento, el Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Il, se reunio el dia 16 durante largo tiempo con la presidenta del Grupo Hyundai, Hyon Jong Un, y su comitiva, de visita en Pyongyang, y satisfizo todas las peticiones de ella conversando en un clima cordial.
					
					Por consiguiente, el CCPAP y el Grupo Hyundai procederan a los siguientes puntos:
					
					1. Reanudaran pronto el interrumpido turismo al monte Kumgang y daran inicio al turismo al pico Piro, el mas alto de este monte.
					
					  Segun la medida especial tomada por el Presidente del CDN, Kim Jong Il, seran garantizadas consecuentemente todas las comodidades y condiciones de seguridad necesarias para el turismo.
					
					2. Rehabilitaran al estado original segun el espiritu de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre el transito terrestre del personal surcoreano por via de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar y su estancia en las zonas del Norte.
					
					3. Reiniciaran inmediatamente el turismo a Kaesong y dinamizaran las labores de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong a medida que se vaya normalizando el transito terrestre por via de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					4. El Grupo Hyundai iniciara el turismo al monte Paektu de acuerdo con la marcha de los preparativos para este fin.
					
					5. Auspiciaran el encuentro en el monte Kumgang entre los familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea en el dia Chusok (15 de agosto lunar) de este ano, fiesta folclorica nacional.
					
					Ambas partes expresaron la voluntad de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y desarrollar activamente las labores de cooperacion por la prosperidad comun de la nacion ateniendose a la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: CRPP revela la peligrosidad de "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
articles.content:
CRPP revela la peligrosidad de  "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
						
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- En su declaracion publicada este lunes, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) revelo y denuncio la peligrosidad del ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea.
					  En cuanto a esta maniobra militar, los yanquis y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos dicen que ella se trata de un "ejercicio rutinario para la defensa" y no "habra el entrenamiento de desplazamiento al aire libre". Pero estos alegatos no pasan de ser una sofisteria descarada para ocultar el caracter agresivo y la siniestra meta que persigue ese ejercicio militar conjunto, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  La entrada de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos en ese ejercicio de guerra de gran envergadura contra el Norte de Corea es imperdonable porque partio del aventurero intento de apoyar en lo militar su siniestra campana de "sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					  Para colmo, la banda de Lee Myung Bak sigue actuando freneticamente como la brigada de choque a cargo de cumplir la imprudente politica agresiva a la RPDC de su amo, en lugar de sacar la leccion de sus maniobras de confrontacion anti-RPDC que llevaron a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Este hecho demuestra el intento de esa camarilla que no desea el mejoramiento de las relaciones con la RPDC.
					
					  La realidad corrobora que el supuesto "dialogo sincero" y la "cooperacion", de que habla la banda de Lee, no son mas que una astuta artimana para enganar a la opinion publica del Sur de Corea y librarse de su responsabilidad por la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					No se disiparan nunca las relaciones hostiles en la Peninsula Coreana antes de que sean eliminadas de raices la brutal politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC y la campana de confrontacion con esta de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas que son satelites de aquel.
